title: custom skins banable
body:
There are several sites that say they have custom skins you can use in game. These are made by people not from riot and are free to use.
My question is, will riot ban me if i use them?
And if it's ok to use them can anyone recomand a site or program because i don't want to use a program with a potential script

replies.body: We don't support any third party programs or modifications currently, and doing so is at your own risk.  We wouldn't be able to provide support is there was an issue as a result.  We also don't know what hidden or malicious content could be hidden within it.  Our stance on third party programs can be found [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications).  I hope that helps clear things up!

I don't know if you want to refer players to an unofficial non-Rioter post for this, but Wuks wrote up a really good thread on this to accentuate cluvie's; http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt

If you're worried about getting banned, the simple answer is to not use 3rd party programs to change or modify your League client. I have heard of several programs as you describe that include skins but also scripts or other hacks, and people do get banned for that. Be careful in which programs you want to download.

I would advise you to only use the LoLKing skin viewer or watch the Skin Spotlights videos if you're unsure about a skin you want to buy. Downloading a program to work around the League client can get you banned.
